EmailTemplate.name: 2019 Dealer Update #15.2019 Dealer Update #15
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins Update - June 28, 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletins | June 2019
FMZ Flight Management System Software Version 6.1
- This sales bulletin announces a GNSSU trade-in credit and provides pricing for FMS 6.1 related upgrades. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-05 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-05-Rev-A-FMS-6-1-SW-Upgrade-for-Business-Aircraft.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
ADS-B Out Upgrade Program​​ for RM-855 and RM-850 Equipped Aircraft
- This sales bulletin describes a promotional offering for equipment exchanges to minimize aircraft downtime. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/j0LI0C2qQ000000ZXGT0E00]]>2019-01 Rev C <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-01-Rev-C_Primus-II-ADS-B-Out-Upgrade-for-Business-Aircraft-with-RM-855.pdf]]> for RM-855 equipped aircraft and 2019-02 Rev C <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-02-Rev-C_Primus-II-ADS-B-Out-Upgrade-for-Business-Aircraft-with-RM-850.pdf]]> for RM-850 equipped aircraft. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/JI2qQ00VCX0ZNE00G000000]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Primus EPIC ADS-B Out for the Embraer 190 Lineage 1000
- This sales bulletin announces Updated exchange pricing option on transponder and GPS Modules for the Embraer 190 Lineage 1000. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-36. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
ADS-B Mandate Solutions for Boeing Business Jets and Airbus Corporate Jets
- For Boeing Business Jet and Airbus Corporate Jet Operators, Honeywell is pleased to offer a fully compliant solution to meet the worldwide mandates for Automatic Dependent Surveillance-Broadcast (ADS-B) Out. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-38%20Rev - BBJ ACJ ADS-B Out Upgrade Sales Bulletin.pdf]]>2019-38 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-38%20Rev - BBJ ACJ ADS-B Out Upgrade Sales Bulletin.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
